Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, we believe it's worth more than $15000 to you. Considering its immense value, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at $20000. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or finalizing the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
